verbs.description: During a [V: fawning] [ARG0: interview] with CNN ’s Chief White House Correspondent Jim Acosta on Wednesday night , aired early Thursday morning , ABC ’s left - wing late night host Jimmy Kimmel repeatedly heaped praise on the reporter for his notorious hostility toward the Trump administration .
